body:
### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`62c64f5`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/62c64f53731a65794f1dd265f312d5a069bd95c0) - **Maps**: Prevent crash when maps folder is not a directory, inform the user instead *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

# Note
This release includes major refactors to improve state management and move shared code across my apps to reusable modules/libraries. Issues are expected, you can report them on [Issues](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/issues) or on [Discord](https://aliernfrog.github.io/discord).

### ‚ú® New Features
- [`4fc7dc9`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4fc7dc969b922361168d570acaa8cf6b8fe54118) - **Maps**: Use toolbar for thumbnail viewer instead of bottom sheet *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`924ce21`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/924ce214a7815ef9950248f299c96b94abde3bf4) - Redesign update flow and API with `minSdk` checks *(PR #90 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0ec623c`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0ec623cc72237a1685cfe4ff9b7503f59918097e) - Add crash handler and support links *(PR #91 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`6dcb24f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/6dcb24fe5820a75c08ba966444c104713b53d278) - Add tooltips to all icon buttons *(PR #92 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`75c6d5a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/75c6d5adff31a93908c2721a4e735342c34061b1) - **l10n**: Update translations *(PR #88 by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`dd8203a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/dd8203a304b694d07bfcb488b52bc2b5ca44e1c1) - **SharedString**: Update resource id based on state *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`55c5a14`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/55c5a14d349edd6171385b61fe261c999ce30474) - **MapsListScreen**: Allow specifying file mime type *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`74269a1`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/74269a14544be42356db72466972c9643a49d748) - **`FileWrapper/createFile`**: `findFile` after `createFile` for DocumentFileCompat *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c67f444`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c67f4449f19b3b677396b7a34d7d75a9f9708efa) - **Shizuku**: Improve reliability when exporting maps and copying files *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`24054d3`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/24054d3ab949d4c79f4848d122976589408ac80a) - Move shared code to separate modules *(PR #86 by @aliernfrog)*
